I have tested the code checked in by Conor

and it works fine, no complaints
here a build snippet
       <p4label
       
name="NightlyBuild"
desc="label with two lines in the view"
lock="locked" 

view="//depot/...://ant/..."/>
       <p4label
       name="OneBuild"
desc="label with one 
line in the view"
lock="locked" 
view="//depot/..."/>

    </target>
